timeline.bodyText:
It seems to me that we now have too many files, how about combine two advanatges

Docker Maven plugin seems to be able to read files from any directory
the Docker image seems to support /etc/my.cnf.d/ directory

If this is the case then I propose to create one that is common to all images - this will be copied over /etc.my.cnf
Then there will be fragment files containin only Debezium specific settings - those would be copied into /etc/my.cnf.d directory to be picked up upon startup.
